snippet: The president suggested creating a public plan like Medicare to promote competition and criticized pharmaceutical companies for failing to lower drug prices....
abstract: Pres Obama publishes article in Journal of the American Medical Assn outlining his views on improving Affordable Care Act and assessing his legacy on health care.
lead_paragraph: The president suggested creating a public plan like Medicare to promote competition and criticized pharmaceutical companies for failing to lower drug prices.

headline.main: Obama Offers Ways to Improve His Health Care Law
headline.print_headline: Obama Offers Ways to Improve His Health Care Law
